title: Textile, 1928
description: Brown, tan, yellow and blue block print on pale green linen. Classical motifs in off-set rows. Circular medallion alternates with elliptically framed flower - with birds and squirrels on leaves. Ellipse is connected by strands of pearls to other motif.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1928.
1928. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-75.
